::Hot Rod::

He saw this bot stop about 500 feet from where he was.
He didn't reconize the body, but there was something familiar.
Suddenly it came to him. He could feel that this was the bot that had
been his opposite. His nemesis, for so many years.
"Galvatron...?!"
